name: Captain America

abilities.name: Shield Throw
abilities.details: Throws his Vibranium shield, bouncing between nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Shield Block
abilities.details: Raises his shield, blocking incoming frontal damage. Reduces movement speed.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.details: Charges forward a short distance, bashing the first enemy hit.

ultimate.name: Avengers Assemble!
ultimate.effect: Grants nearby allies +15% Damage Reduction and +10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds.
ultimate.details: Inspires his team with a rallying cry, bolstering their defenses and speed.

passives.name: Super Soldier
passives.details: Enhanced strength slightly increases melee damage (if applicable). May have slightly faster base health regeneration.

teamups.effect: When Captain America blocks damage, nearby specified allies gain a small amount of Ultimate charge.

lore: Steve Rogers, a frail young man enhanced to the peak of human perfection by the Super-Soldier serum during World War II. He is a symbol of justice and liberty, leading the Avengers with his tactical brilliance and unwavering resolve.

comics.title: Captain America (various series, particularly by Brubaker)
